definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: look, bahold (As. dagâlu, Lotz:TP 131; Thes RobGes MV SS De make [[דָּגוּל]] a denom. fr. [[דֶּגֶל]] = lifted up like a banner, or furnished with a banner, i.e. exalted, distinguished, AV RV chiefest);—Pt. pass. [[דָּגוּל מֵרְבָבָה]] Ct So 5:10 looked at, conspicuous, acc. to Dl:HA 40.
